message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $115. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $105 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $110.  I believe this is a fair price, considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $110, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $107.50?
Bob, I see you're trying to be fair.  $107.50 is closer, but I'm still stuck at $110. This is really my bottom line, but I'm happy to continue talking if you have another proposal.
I understand that you're at your bottom line, but I'm still trying to make a deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $106.50?
